RC8D.RotateLeft.name: Rotate Camera Left
RC8D.RotateLeft.hint: Rotates the canvas 45° counter-clockwise around the center of your view.
RC8D.RotateRight.name: Rotate Camera Right
RC8D.RotateRight.hint: Rotates the canvas 45° clockwise around the center of your view.
RC8D.ShowCompass.name: Show Compass
RC8D.ShowCompass.hint: Displays a compass at the top of the screen that always points north.
RC8D.CompassSize.name: Compass Size
RC8D.CompassSize.hint: Adjust the compass display size in pixels.
RC8D.ShowCompassLabels.name: Show Compass Labels
RC8D.ShowCompassLabels.hint: Show or hide the N/NE/E/SE/S/SW/W/NW labels around the compass.
RC8D.CompassTheme.name: Compass Theme
RC8D.CompassTheme.hint: Choose the visual style of the Rotate Camera 8D compass.
RC8D.DisableRotation.label: Disable Rotate Camera 8D
RC8D.DisableRotation.hint: Blocks camera rotation for this scene (useful for landing or overview scenes).
RC8D.DisableRotation.notification: Camera rotation is disabled in this scene.
